As an AI language model, I don't have personal views and opinions. However, I can state some possible impacts of modern technology on the practices and traditions of the Afrikaner people:

1. Communication: The advent of modern technology has revolutionized the way Afrikaner people communicate with each other. Today, they can use social media, messaging applications, and video conferencing to communicate with their loved ones, even if they are miles apart.

2. Education: Technology has opened up new avenues for education and training for the Afrikaner people. Today, they can access information from all over the world, and online learning has made it possible for them to upgrade their skills and knowledge.

3. Lifestyle changes: Modern technology has also impacted the lifestyle of the Afrikaner people. They can now shop online, order food delivery, and access entertainment without leaving their homes. This has changed the way they live their lives and interact with others.

4. Agriculture: Agriculture has been a significant part of Afrikaner culture and traditions. Modern technology has impacted agriculture by introducing mechanization, irrigation systems, and genetically modified crops. These new practices have made farming more efficient and productive.

5. Preservation of culture: Despite the impact of modern technology, the Afrikaner people have maintained their traditions and culture. They use technology to promote their cultural heritage and traditions through social media, websites, and online forums.
